page.title: 16MY HOME AREA, ARRETON
page.content: Ben Brown is 8 years old and tells us about where he lives. He says that there are many dust tracks round the nearby fields where he can ride his bike safely. There are lots of trees around. He likes to go down to the gravel pit with his dad. The gravel was dug out for building but the area is now being filled in, levelled with earth and grass seed will be planted. On the way to the gravel pit Ben passes two reservoirs which are used for fishing. These are stocked with carp, used for game fishing, as well as trout and eels for eating. Ben uses a rod for fishing and also uses a net to put the fish in when caught.
